/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and bicycles navigating their way through the city's arteries. Buildings of various heights and designs line the street, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the dynamic cityscape. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
